NewsArticle.Title: Lover's Garden
NewsArticle.Content:
*Trumpets Blair*
Hear Ye, Hear Ye,
On this special occasion of love, King Bruce has decided to open his Royal Garden to the public. The Royal Garden is now named the Lover's Garden. So come to Loures and enjoy the festivities. The entrance is near the entrance to Loures Castle.
Courtney Jester of Loures
